See the project online

Project Overview

Build an Weather app using JavaScript and the Openweathermap API.

Retrive information about temperature (Celsius degrees), date and humidity.

Project details

  • OpenWeatherMap API

  • Responsive web page, design responds well from mobile (320px), to tablet and desktop screen sizes.

  • Search and autocomplete functionality - Typeahead.js.

  • Change background image to match the weather.

  • City name, date.

  • Temperature - Celsius degrees.

  • Pressure, cloudiness.

  • Wind speed, humidity.

  • Weather at current location button.

OpenWeatherMap.org
